languages.text: Песок покрыт ямами, будто кто-то что-то копал. Или пытался выбраться наружу.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
languages.original_text: Песок покрыт ямами, будто кто-то что-то копал. Или пытался выбраться наружу.

traits.locale_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.
There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

languages.text: Hay agujeros en la arena, como si alguien hubiera intentado sacar algo... o escapar de ella.
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: Hay agujeros en la arena, como si alguien hubiera intentado sacar algo... o escapar de ella.

languages.text: 沙子上有许多坑，看起来像是某人之前打算挖出什么东西，或是挖出一条出路。
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: 沙子上有许多坑，看起来像是某人之前打算挖出什么东西，或是挖出一条出路。

languages.text: 何者かが何かを掘り出そうとしたような、あるいは脱出しようとしたような孔が砂の中にある。
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: 何者かが何かを掘り出そうとしたような、あるいは脱出しようとしたような孔が砂の中にある。

languages.text: Die Gruben im Sand sehen aus, als hätte jemand etwas ausgegraben ... oder sich selbst befreit.
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: Die Gruben im Sand sehen aus, als hätte jemand etwas ausgegraben ... oder sich selbst befreit.

languages.text: Vous remarquez des trous dans le sable, comme si on avait cherché à déterrer quelque chose... ou à se frayer un chemin jusqu'à la surface.
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: Vous remarquez des trous dans le sable, comme si on avait cherché à déterrer quelque chose... ou à se frayer un chemin jusqu'à la surface.

languages.text: Kumda, sanki bir şeyi kazarak çıkarmayı denemişler veya kazarak çıkmaya çalışmışlar gibi çukurlar var.
languages.original_text: There are pits in the sand as if someone tried to dig something out — or dig their way out.

traits.locale_text: Kumda, sanki bir şeyi kazarak çıkarmayı denemişler veya kazarak çıkmaya çalışmışlar gibi çukurlar var.
